headline: AMAT vs. AMKR: Which AI-Driven Semiconductor Stock is a Safer Bet?
summary: Applied Materials is gaining from a surge in HBM demand, while Amkor Technology grapples with softer demand across some of its end markets.

raw.headline: AMAT vs. AMKR: Which AI-Driven Semiconductor Stock is a Safer Bet?
raw.summary: Applied Materials is gaining from a surge in HBM demand, while Amkor Technology grapples with softer demand across some of its end markets.

headline: Applied Materials expects 20% growth in semiconductor business in 2026
summary: Although Q1 2026 revenue was down 2% year over year, the company credited its “strong results” to AI-computing-driven demand.

headline: AMAT Stock Key Score Climbs As AI Demand And Operational Efficiency Drive Q1 Surge
summary: AMAT's Quality score hits 90.89 after a Q1 earnings beat. 49.1% margins and AI growth landed Applied Materials in the top 10% of stocks.
